original_text: Then Asa the king took all Judah; and they carried away the stones of Ramah, and the timber thereof, wherewith Baasha was building; and he built therewith Geba and Mizpah.
korean_text: 아사 왕이 온 유다 무리를 거느리고 바아사가 라마를 건축하던 돌과 재목을 운반하여다가 게바와 미스바를 건축하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then Asa the king took all Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 아사 왕은 온 유다를 이끌고

sentences.original_text: and they carried away the stones of Ramah
and he built therewith Geba and Mizpah
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그것들로 게바와 미스바를 건축했더라
